content: @Ryan Howells We noticed the updates to the IG per Interim Version 0.1.3 for CPCDS - September 8, 2020 - and are updating our specs per the new version updates. Are there any additional significant changes expected to C4BB prior to 1/1/21, including profile, codesystem, and valueset names? And if so, when? Thanks, John

@John Achoukian
See the thread: https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/204607-CARIN-IG.20for.20Blue.20Button.C2.AE/topic/1.2F1.2F2021.20Implementation

My personal opinion is "yes." Do expect changes. Don't expect a "safe" version lock until v1 (Release 1).
